name: Catch 2 small (+100) objects (Pitch Perfect / Pitch for Prizes)
Silver medal (Fowl Dodgeball / Duck and Dodge)
600 points across multiple games (Tricky Pins / Skittle Skills)
No medal while sinking 5 balls (Pro Putter / Putter Madness)
610 points without red button (100-Pin Pro / Triple Whammy)
250.0 points without driver (Driver Challenge / Target Shooter)
Exactly 95 pins in two frames (100-Pin Pro / Triple Whammy)
2500 points across multiple games (Wall Breaker / Smash Hitter)
Get hit 3 or fewer times without pausing the game (Fowl Dodgeball / Duck and Dodge)
Land on top of all 4 letters on Hole L7 (Golf)
500 points across multiple games (Tennis Moles / Mole Commotion)
